Articles.Content:
Star is short-lived due to insufficient mass.  

I claim the cooling cinder of what was once the core of Planet 9.

![Image result for death star](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/starwars/images/7/72/DeathStar1-SWE.png/revision/latest?cb=20150121020639)

My asteroid field.

That's just Mimas

![mimas_moon_large.jpg](http://ichef.bbci.co.uk/solarsystem/img/ic/640/moons/mimas_moon/mimas_moon_large.jpg)

My Mimas

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-02T14:36:57Z" title="12/02/2016 02:36  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 2, 2016</time> by Xorth Tanovar**

Heat signature Pacman eats Mimas thinking it was just another rather large dot to eat.

![Image result for mimas pacman](http://voices.nationalgeographic.com/files/2011/03/mimas-pac-man-moon1.jpg)

My Pacman.

I destroy the pacman by telling it that it's just an optical illusion. I then betray [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/), nuke him into pieces, and bury him in the center of Mimas. Finally, I reassert KSP as the dominant realityset for this game, deleting Mimas, the nukes, the bits of sandwich, Saturn, and all other non-ksp artifacts.

My Kerbal Space Center.

Spoiler

With [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) as the first astronaut.

Spoiler

You didn't think I *really* betrayed him, right? That was just a well-planned diversion to confuse our mutual enemies. Now shh, it's a secret.

i do a takeover like in Plan Kappa, slowly buying all the stock

my space center

I request a team up with [@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/). If Turtle and Sandwich can have one, then other people should.  

My possible mutual space centre

I built more Time Portal Machines and destroyed Kerbin sooner than expected.

My space where Kerbin used to be.

i get the second death star, and blow up all the ships and people in the area

my space where kerbin used to be

I declare myself not a person, and therefore am still alive

I still request a team up [@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/)

My living me

I lock you up in a cage and I transfrom you to be a human.

My slave.

i became our only president that was a pig, Abe-a-ham Lincoln

my freed slaves
I create my own hill and build multiple defense turrets around it.

I put on giant big-foot shoes and walk around in the mud, scaring everyone into leaving the planet because they thing they'll get eaten.

My deserted planet.

My hill has done well; I have placed even more turrets around it as the hill has grown in size.

My ever-growing mountain

I drop [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) on your mountain. I then drop [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/) on [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/), and repeat until total organ failure occurs.

Not your mountain, and not [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/)'s either

I drop 10.5 nukes on your space center.

I request to make an alliance with [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@adsii1970](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/89014-adsii1970/).

My mountain has withstood the Raging sandwich attack.
I take out my magic wand and cast a spell on [@Kosmonaut](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/137785-kosmonaut/) 's little hill and turn it into a crater...

I have inhabited [@Kosmonaut](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/137785-kosmonaut/)'s crater, and now I have defended it with turrets, and other weapons. I plan to add an underground transport system to connect my 2 bases.

I bury myself underground so no one can drop me on things.

My foxhole (with a roof)

> 
> 
> On 12/1/2016 at 8:37 PM, Kosmonaut said:
> 
> 
> Sorry, does nobody remember that everyone except for [@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/) is dead?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/)s everything
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Except that I regenerate into a better, sexier me, and I use a good deal of toilet paper and milk to take over the rocky planets in the solar system
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My rocky planets
> 

Well I just joined so I can't be dead ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

 I use soldiers to go in the hole. They catch you by surprise and my soldiers kill you and you troops. 

Me and my alliances empire.

*AAallllll by my seeeeeeellllffffff*

My home is going well; My bunker has been hooked up to my hill, and I continue to expand.

My associated territories
I put your associated territories in a bag. My territories
